title: Segfault in futex_wait() on riscv64gc-unknown-linux-gnu with rustc 1.64.0
body:
Note, this does not appear to be related to issue #102155 but I can't be sure.

I'm many levels deep in the original problem, but traced it down to autocfg not building (filed here: https://github.com/cuviper/autocfg/issues/51); the repro is trivial.

The back trace however makes me suspect this is a deeper issue:

Unfortunately I don't have the expertise to debug this.
